page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: My house is built out of stone.It has seven windows and eight doors.The windows are narrow and open at the top.The floors downstairs are made out of cement,those upstairs from wood.I live in an end terraced house.At the front of my house there is a garden,a path leads up the garden.The garden has ten different kinds of flowers and shrubs. They are named daffodil,climbing rose,lobelia, hydrangeas,gladioli,alyssum,spiraea, polyanthus,hypericum and honeysuckle.I have a yard at the back with a shed in it.Recently we had some alterations made.We had new doors and windows fitted,a damp proof course,rewired, central heating and an extention built on with a bathroom and kitchen.I have lived in Low Church Street all my life.We have nice neighbours and I wouldn't like to move.
